representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 14496-15:2004. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 15: Advanced Video Coding (AVC) File Format (formal name); MPEG-4 AVC file format (common name)
representation_information.description: Emerging format developed by the Moving Picture Experts Group (MPEG) for communicating audiovisual scenes, likely to be used for web content, other online applications, and mobile devices, i.e., cell phones and PDAs, although potential applications are much broader. Wraps Advanced Video Coding (AVC) with certain extensions, described in MPEG-4_AVC_EXT.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
